description.displayText: Stephanie has worked for me for about 3 months now.  She helps me with my 3.5 year old and 8 month old.  She plays with the kids and does anything else I ask her to such has dishes and laundry.  I wouldn't hesitate to hire Stephanie.
description.originalText: Stephanie has worked for me for about 3 months now.  She helps me with my 3.5 year old and 8 month old.  She plays with the kids and does anything else I ask her to such has dishes and laundry.  I wouldn't hesitate to hire Stephanie.

description.displayText: We hired Stephanie for the day to help us care for our 4 week old twins and do basic household tasks like cleaning bottles. She was only ever responsible for one child at a time (one of us was always with her as well.) She arrived on time and spent 8 hours with us. She was competent at cleaning, feeding/burping the babies and helping us put them to sleep for naps and at bedtime. However, she was not very friendly or playful with them, and somewhat terse about their needs and bodily functions. For example, she asked why they kept spitting up (because they are newborns) and openly expressed disgust about their poop/gas. She was flexible about scheduling so that was helpful. Would hire again in a pinch.

Would hire again in a pinch.

description.displayText: Stephanie worked for me for one year in Trenton NJ taking care of my son who is now 3yrs old. She was always punctual; and had a flexible schedule that worked great with me since my job gave out the schedule the Friday before the week started, and my son loves her. She takes pride in her appearance and treats children as if they were her own making sure they are fed, dressed, and ready for either school or any activity that they partake in. It was really important for me to find someone who would take good care of an infant and after interviewing her I decided to give her a shot and I can say it was one of the best choices I made. I would still have her take care of my child but she had to move to Bridgewater. I hope this information is helpful to anyone looking for someone to take care of their children.

description.displayText: Stephanie is a very dependable woman, always makes it on time and is great with children. Can't think of anyone better.
